lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The plan called on Japan to promote government purchases of foreign goods and private sector imports of manufactured goods by improving import financing, and to make clear official procurement procedures for foreign supercomputers.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The plan calls for additional fiscal measures worth more than 5,000 billion yen, a large-scale supplementary budget for the current fiscal year started April 1, and concentration of more than 80 pct of the annual public works budget in the first half of the year, they said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The LDP called for adequate and flexible management of monetary policy, such as a cut in interest rates on deposits with the Finance Ministry's Trust Fund, and a tax cut to promote plant and equipment investment.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The plan called on Japan to promote government purchases of foreign goods and private sector imports of manufactured goods by improving import financing, and to make clear official procurement procedures for foreign supercomputers.
